opening_theme: "Friend Shitai (ふ・れ・ん・ど・し・た・い)" by Gakuen Seikatsubu [Yuki Takeya (Inori Minase), Kurumi Ebisuzawa (Ari Ozawa), Yuuri Wakasa (M.A.O), Miki Naoki (Rie Takahashi)] (eps 1-11)
